plot: An insider's look into Hollywood's unsung heros; the crew, the producers, actors, personal trainers, publicists, and the people who make the world of movie and television magic possible.
plot_en: An insider's look into Hollywood's unsung heros; the crew, the producers, actors, personal trainers, publicists, and the people who make the world of movie and television magic possible.
plot_es: An insider's look into Hollywood's unsung heros; the crew, the producers, actors, personal trainers, publicists, and the people who make the world of movie and television magic possible.
title: To Be in the Biz
